ValidationRule.description: Stops reps and sales managers from making appointments on a federal holiday.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: ActivityDate = DATE(2021,01,1) || ActivityDate = DATE(2020,05,25) || ActivityDate = DATE(2020,07,04) || ActivityDate = DATE(2020,011,26) || ActivityDate = DATE(2020,12,25) || ActivityDate = DATE(2020,09,07)
ValidationRule.errorMessage: You can not schedule an appointment on a holiday. Please select another date for the appointment.
